title: Neon Nightscape.
content:
# Welcome to Neon Nightscape!

Our website is dedicated to showcasing the beauty and wonder of the night sky, reimagined in vibrant neon colors. Our stunning wallpaper captures the essence of a starry night, but with a modern twist that is sure to captivate your senses.

At Neon Nightscape, we believe that the night sky is a source of inspiration and awe, and our goal is to bring that feeling to your digital devices. Whether you're looking for a new desktop background or a unique screensaver, our collection of neon-colored nightscapes is sure to impress.

So why settle for a boring, static wallpaper when you can have a dynamic and eye-catching display that reflects your personality and style? Explore our collection today and discover the magic of Neon Nightscape!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A neon-colored interpretation of a starry sky"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
